title: 28 对称的二叉树
content:
Description #   给定一棵二叉树，判断其是否是自身的镜像（即：是否对称）
 Solutions #  Recursive #  func isSymmetrical( pRoot *TreeNode ) bool {  // write code here  if pRoot == nil {  return true  }   return isSameTree(pRoot.Left, pRoot.Right) }  func isSameTree(root1, root2 *TreeNode) bool {  if root1 == nil && root2 == nil {  return true  }   if root1 == nil || root2 == nil {  return false  }   if root1.Val != root2.Val {  return false  }   return isSameTree(root1.Left, root2.Right) && isSameTree(root1.Right, root2.Left) }
